trends: There have been 128 other sightings in Fort Worth
There were no other sightings in Fort Worth on or around November 30th 1971
divs: sighting details1959 experienced a guided white light infront or at distance from the moon this was witnessed by my brother. again in 1972 a sphere was seen 'arching' for 30 mins approx..covering 30 miles in one arch and returning back and forth. this was around a village called 'brinklow' @ the end of the roman, 'fosse way'. another sighting of one later that year. willesden london 1974 i experienced a pesonal abduction with, 'now i know, now' - "blondies" (but did not know any catagories of aliens then) with pale features and blond hair. many people were in the same abduction. there was a round very large disk and the inerior was round skirted by windows. the aliens were examining quite a few people on tables of black supports and conversing with mental communication and not in speech. i provided the alien with some information and she\he\it said 'that i was not required'. i then was escourted away, however a lot of people were decending down this black staircase or ramp. i then felt a return to my room. prior to abduction the sheets of my bed were of a 'plastic' texture. i did not know then, of any 'types' of alien, only years afterwards did i learn of the alien groups. so by this aspect it could substantiate the abduction. there is much more to tell on this, so i do hope to be able to to relate to you, at a time in the future.
Summary: I've experienced 3 UFO( Definate) sightings and had a possible (Personal) abduction
